title: Correct statements about energy block on spring

content.prompt: Which of the following statements about energy is correct?

choices.label: The potential energy of the spring is at a minimum at x = 0.
The potential energy of the spring is at a minimum at x = A.
The kinetic energy of the block is at a minimum at x = 0.
The kinetic energy of the block is at a maximum at x = A.
The kinetic energy of the block is always equal to the potential energy of the spring.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
